subject: Re: Stella AU - FIGUR promo banner to remove
preview: Hi Vivian,  We have updated the pages It should be working fine now. https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/

full_threads.body:
Hi Vivian,

We have updated the pages It should be working fine now.
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/

Thanks Joel for updating - the banner slider looks good on both pages now.

Would you be able to adjust the award logo as it's not rendering fully on a mobile screen (see attached)?

Thanks a lot,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848 (new number)

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Vivian,

We have made updates to the slider. let me know if this works for you?

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/car-insurance/

Hi Rica - thanks but can we change the homepage and car insurance page to the version before the Figur promotion?
The promo has ended so we only want to display the regular images

Thanks a lot,

Vivian

Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Vivian,

Confirming we have updated the pages and footer. Let us know if this works for you?

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/car-insurance/

Hi Vivian,

Sure, we will remove that footer copy right section tomorrow.

Hi Joel,

Thanks - are you also able to revert to the previous disclaimer in the footer on both homepage & /car-insurance page for the changeover? Which is just the version without the last paragraph (see below).



Thanks a lot,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848 (new number)

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Vivian,

Just jumping in on behalf of Rica.

Sure, we will schedule to turn off the Black Friday from the slider. Tomorrow 11:59pm Sydney time. We will reply to this email once it is updated.
@joel need your assistance here. Thanks!

Hi Rica,

As our Black Friday offer is ending tomorrow 30th Nov at 11:59pm (Sydney time). Are we able to schedule the banner changeover?

Both homepage and /car-insurance page will be reverted back to the slideshows with regular brand images (those ones we used prior to Stella x FIGUR promotion).

Please let me know if you have any questions. And it would be great if you could confirm once it's been actioned / scheduled.

Many thanks,

Vivian



Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848 (new number)

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi team,


As the FIGUR promotion is ending tonight (11:59pm Sydney time), are you able to remove the promo banner from both homepage & /car-insurance page before tomorrow 26 Jan?


The Black Friday offer banner can then take over as the main / only banner.


It would be great if you could confirm once it's been actioned.







Thanks a lot,
Vivian
